description:
Using the latest Nova Folsom with auto_assign_floating_ip=True....

Floating IPs appear to be assigned immediately however they don't show up in the network info of an instance until the cache is refreshed which can sometimes take awhile.

For me the cache is first refreshed when the instance boots and hits the metadata server for keypairs.
title: auto assigned floating ips should show up immediately

comments.content:
Using the latest Nova Folsom with auto_assign_floating_ip=True....

Floating IPs appear to be assigned immediately however they don't show up in the network info of an instance until the cache is refreshed which can sometimes take awhile.

For me the cache is first refreshed when the instance boots and hits the metadata server for keypairs.
